name: A Tough Stroll
description:
You are a high school student, who has recently been accepted into university, but you may have to sacrifice some relationships and time if you want to succeed in your new life. What will happen to your old friends? How will your choices affect your sanity? Will you finish the story alive?

Change the world around you depending on your choices!

Experience 32 unique endings, all with their own levels of severity!

Play at your own pace, there is no timer!

Listen to gorgeous sounds of nature and calming music!

Walk through your favourite neck of the woods, with completely new assets!
